name: viralclipai
description: Viral Clip AI - AI-powered video clip generation

scripts.dev: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d && docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml logs -f
scripts.dev:api: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d api && docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml logs -f api
scripts.dev:web: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d web && docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml logs -f web
scripts.dev:shell:api: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec api /bin/bash || docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec api /bin/sh

author: Viral Clip AI Team
